name: Fire's Savety
description:
This little 3D adventure game is about Finn, a very anxious little crow who tries to protect the big fire in the middle of his village from a storm. But not one of the three villagers makes it easy for him.

Is it really so hard for anyone to listen to Finn?? This is serious!

Controlls

How to download

1. Download the ZIP File down below

2. Unpack the Folder

3. Start the Fire'sSavety.exe

4. Enjoy playing!

Credits 

all Assets, InGame Graphics and Programming made by me

Water Shader is made by Flaroon on Youtube

Music and SFX are from Weloveindies.com
